column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Obviously there are flaws. If we didn't order enough food
column2: then it would be a pain to get more pizza. There didn't seem to be a convenient elevator nearby and I had sprained my knee
column3: so the stairs were a bit brutal for me. The plates on the table seemed to have some food on it
column4: which looks like transfer from dirty plate onto a wet but clean plate. The staff took it away and gave me a new one
column5: and I have no idea if they just wiped it down and gave back the same plate. But I've eaten in some sketchy places in Asia and Africa
column6: so this was still ok for me.
